Text.Page:
Everyone's just hacking down the vampirs, but I'm not sure that's going to be the best plan. I think we can...fix them, as it were...if we can figure out what's going on.

They're stronger now than they ever were before. I might be able to figure out why, if I examine their blood.

Go out and get me a few blood samples from the {@LinkCreature:16#2301#blood maids}, if you would.

This...is not what I expected. I can't even properly read these results. It's clear, however, this is not the result of a diet change.

I think there's some dark magic behind this...
Have you brought the blood I need? Hand it over if you have it.
